title: Trump blasts immigrants from 's***hole countries' - sources
text:
Trump blasts immigrants from 's***hole countries' - sources Friday, January 12, 2018 - 01:20 
U.S. President Donald Trump questions why America would want to have immigrants from Haiti and African nations, referring to some as 's***hole' countries, according to two sources familiar with the remarks.   
U.S. President Donald Trump questions why America would want to have immigrants from Haiti and African nations, referring to some as 's***hole' countries, according to two sources familiar with the remarks.  //reut.rs/2D3HVgW
